biotools.summary: Web server for the analysis and comparison of genomic copy number alterations in multiple same species samples. For human, mouse and rat genomes, results are mapped back onto the genome.

bioschemas.name: waviCGH
bioschemas.summary: Web server for the analysis and comparison of genomic copy number alterations in multiple same species samples. For human, mouse and rat genomes, results are mapped back onto the genome.
